alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 9:37AM CST until November 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: .Overview... A weather system is bringing the seasons first accumulating snow fall to the area. Snow will continue through the day today, with accumulations around 2 inches. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Wabasha, Dodge and Olmsted Counties. In Wisconsin, Buffalo County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
